DISEASE: Microcephaly, Seizures, Spasticity, And Brain Calcifications
RECORD:
Rare disease patients have complex clinical representations. Patients with Microcephaly, Seizures, Spasticity, And Brain Calcifications present clinical features that include epilepsy, developmental delay, microcephaly, spasticity, and calcifications in the brain. The disease is caused by mutations in the KCNAB1 gene and is inherited in an autosomal recessive manner.
